skill_constraints: Single DevOps engineer is a bottleneck for infrastructure setup in Sprints 1-2 (RISK-003). Low planned QA hours risk quality (RISK-006).
resource_bottlenecks: DevOps in Sprints 1-2. Senior Backend expertise for Saga in Sprint 3.
mitigation_strategies: Prioritize DevOps tasks first. Senior backend to mentor on Saga pattern.

skill_constraints: Onboarding overhead for new team members.
resource_bottlenecks: DevOps still a bottleneck in Sprint 1, but reduced overall project risk.
mitigation_strategies: Parallelize backend development (Saga + other services). Dedicated QA automation reduces quality risk.
